Package org.kitodo.production.plugin.opac.pica

Contains a plug-in required to access a PICA library catalogue system.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    PicaPlugin
    The class PicaPlugin is the main class of the Goobi PICA catalogue plugin implementation.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    UnreachableCodeException  

Package org.kitodo.production.plugin.opac.pica Description

Contains a plug-in required to access a PICA library catalogue system. The main class implementing the plug-in is PicaPlugin. It provides the following public methods which are specified in UnspecificPlugin: 
    void    configure(Map)
   String  getDescription()
   String  getTitle()
and in CataloguePlugin: 
    Object  find(String, long)
   Map     getHit(Object, long, long)
   long    getNumberOfHits(Object, long)
   void    setPreferences(Prefs)
   boolean supportsCatalogue(String)
   void    useCatalogue(String)
Most of the code originates form the package de.unigoettingen.sub.search.opac created by “Ludwig” and maybe others in 2005. To compile, the plug-in requires the libraries from /Goobi/WEB-INF/lib and the Tomcat server runtime libraries on the class path.
Author:
Matthias Ronge
